Type.Name: IconView

TypeSignature.Value: public class IconView : Gtk.Container, Gtk.ICellLayout, Gtk.IScrollable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IconView extends Gtk.Container implements class GLib.IWrapper, class Gtk.ICellLayout, class Gtk.IScrollable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A widget which displays a list of icons in a grid
Docs.remarks: provides an alternative view on a list model. It displays the model as a grid of icons with labels. Like , it allows to select one or multiple items (depending on the selection mode, see ). In addition to selection with the arrow keys, supports rubberband selection, which is controlled by dragging the pointer.

The columns property contains the number of the columns in which the items should be displayed.
Docs.remarks: If it is -1, the number of columns will be chosen automatically to fill the available area.

Docs.summary: Gets the visible range of items in the view.
Docs.returns: if the start and end paths were set.
Docs.remarks: There may be invisible paths between the start and end paths.

Docs.summary: Emitted when an item is activated.
The width used for each item.
Space which is inserted at the edges of the icon view.
Contains the number of the model column containing markup information to be displayed.
Docs.remarks: The markup column must be of type . If this property and the TextColumn property are both set to column numbers, it overrides the text column. If both are set to -1, no texts are displayed.

Docs.summary: The model for the icon view.

Docs.summary: Returns if the icon pointed to by is currently selected.
Docs.remarks: If does not point to a valid location, is returned.

Docs.summary: Contains the number of the model column containing the pixbufs which are displayed
Docs.remarks: The pixbuf column must be of type . Setting this property to -1 turns off the display of pixbufs.

Indicates whether the list can be reordered via Drag and Drop.
Space which is inserted between grid rows.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollToPath(class Gtk.TreePath path) cil managed

Docs.param: a of the item to be made visible by scrolling.
Docs.summary: Scrolls the view to make an item visible.
Docs.remarks: The minimum amount of scrolling will be done to make the item visible. To control the item's final position within the visible part of the widget, use the other overload of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ScrollToPath (Gtk.TreePath path, float row_align, float col_align);

Docs.param: a of the item to be made visible by scrolling.
Docs.summary: Scrolls the view to make an item visible.
Docs.remarks: Using row_align of 0.5 and col_align of 0.5 will try to center the item in the visible part of the widget.

Docs.remarks: The IconView must has its selection mode set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectedForeach(class Gtk.IconViewForeachFunc func) cil managed

Docs.summary: Calls a function for each selected icon.
Docs.remarks: Note that the model or selection cannot be modified from within this function.

Docs.summary: Creates a list of paths of all selected items.
Emitted when the current selection changes.
Specifies the selection mode of icon view.
Docs.remarks: If the mode is , rubberband selection is enabled, for the other modes, only keyboard selection is possible.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCellDataFunc (Gtk.CellRenderer cell, Gtk.CellLayoutDataFunc func);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetCellDataFunc(class Gtk.CellRenderer cell, class Gtk.CellLayoutDataFunc func) cil managed

Docs.param: a , or to remove an existing delegate.
Docs.summary: Sets the Cell Data delegate for a renderer.
Docs.remarks: The Cell data func is an alternative to binding attributes to model columns. The delegate is invoked any time the cell is renderer and it should set up all the appropriate renderer information.
